Sentencas: An oxygen-excess-type lanthanum silicate (LSO) solid electrolyte with high chemical stability as well as high ion conductivity was developed by optimizing the chemical composition, La-9.333 (+ x)(Si-6 - yAl(y))O-26 (+ 1.5x) (- 0.5y).
Titulo: Oxide ion and electron transport properties in lanthanum silicate oxyapatite ceramics

Sentencas: It was found that La-10(Si5.8Al0.2)O-26.9 (x = 0.667, y = 0.2) exhibited the highest conductivity among them, and addition of a small amount of iron was effective for the improvement of its chemical stability.
Titulo: Oxide ion and electron transport properties in lanthanum silicate oxyapatite ceramics

Sentencas: The LSO specimen of x = 0.667 and y = 0.2 with iron addition (0.5 mol%) was chemically stable and had a conductivity of 5.6 x 10(-2)
Titulo: Oxide ion and electron transport properties in lanthanum silicate oxyapatite ceramics

Sentencas: S cm(-1) under air at 1073 K, while its electronic conductivity was less than 2.0 x 10(-4)
Titulo: Oxide ion and electron transport properties in lanthanum silicate oxyapatite ceramics

Sentencas: S cm(-1) at the same temperature.
Titulo: Oxide ion and electron transport properties in lanthanum silicate oxyapatite ceramics

Sentencas: The oxygen tracer diffusion coefficient, D-o* of this material was determined as 2.0 x 10(-8) cm(2) s(-1) at 1073 K. (C) 2014
Titulo: Oxide ion and electron transport properties in lanthanum silicate oxyapatite ceramics
